snippet.title: Steve Williams calls Lydia Ko’s decision to dump long-time coach ‘unethical,’ career-threatening
snippet.description:
Steve Williams calls Lydia Ko’s decision to dump long-time coach ‘unethical,’ career-threatening by Emily Kay on Dec 23 2013, 11:16a
Lydia Ko fires the only golf coach she’s ever had just as her professional career’s about to take off and Tiger's ex-looper, Steve Williams, is not pleased.

snippet.title: Tiger Woods could take Twitter tips from Rory McIlroy
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods could take Twitter tips from Rory McIlroy by Emily Kay on Dec 11 2013, 1:54p
Rory McIlroy shares semi-intimate details of his relationship with Caroline Wozniacki online but complains that his private life is nobody’s business.

snippet.title: 2013 Top 25 golf stories: Streakers, pet squirrels, and Tiger's dorky high-5 at the Presidents Cup
snippet.description:
2013 Top 25 golf stories: Streakers, pet squirrels, and Tiger's dorky high-5 at the Presidents Cup by Brendan Porath on Dec 5 2013, 10:00a
The Americans continued to dominate, but there were plenty of other ways the latest edition of the Presidents Cup became memorable.

snippet.title: Rory McIlroy enjoys Tiger Woods' trash talk but worries about increasing stress on athletes
snippet.description:
Rory McIlroy enjoys Tiger Woods' trash talk but worries about increasing stress on athletes by Emily Kay on Nov 27 2013, 11:13a
After a year from hell on and off the golf course, Rory McIlroy worries about the toll that stress can take on an athlete.

snippet.title: Lexi Thompson cruises, Lydia Ko’s cool, and Big 3 trail Sandra Gal at LPGA Titleholders
snippet.description:
Lexi Thompson cruises, Lydia Ko’s cool, and Big 3 trail Sandra Gal at LPGA Titleholders by Emily Kay on Nov 22 2013, 9:30a
Sandra Gal steals the show from a star-studded cast of players in the opening round of the LPGA Tour’s season-ending event.

snippet.title: Top 25 golf stories of 2013, No. 24: Teen phenom Lydia Ko racks up the wins, joins LPGA Tour
snippet.description:
Top 25 golf stories of 2013, No. 24: Teen phenom Lydia Ko racks up the wins, joins LPGA Tour by Emily Kay on Nov 19 2013, 11:00a
Lydia Ko, following in Lexi Thompson’s footsteps when she became, in 2012, the youngest golfer to notch an LPGA victory, adds more Ws to her resume this year on her way to turning pro and joining...

snippet.title: Top 25 golf stories of 2013, No. 25: Rory McIlroy switches to Nike, miserable winless year follows
snippet.description:
Top 25 golf stories of 2013, No. 25: Rory McIlroy switches to Nike, miserable winless year follows by Emily Kay on Nov 18 2013, 12:00p
Narratives abound for the 2013 season just ended, and Rory McIlroy made his share of headlines, for better but, mostly, for worse.

snippet.title: Over the edge: Once a year, hundreds of people voluntarily jump off one of America's largest bridges and into West Virginia's New River Gorge. But for many of these BASE jumpers, it's not enough.
snippet.description:
Over the edge: Once a year, hundreds of people voluntarily jump off one of America's largest bridges and into West Virginia's New River Gorge. But for many of these BASE jumpers, it's not enough. by Jeremy Markovich on Nov 6 2013, 10:20a
Cody Adams takes a drag off his cigarette, and looks over at Andy Smith. "You scared yet?" he asks. "Definitely scared," Smith tells him. "I'm trying to convince myself that I'm not." ...

snippet.title: Tiger Woods favors fines for slow play on the PGA Tour
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods favors fines for slow play on the PGA Tour by Emily Kay on Oct 16 2013, 9:00a
Tiger Woods believes his colleagues will speed around the course if officials threaten to debit their bank accounts.

snippet.title: Rory McIlroy blames struggles on mental, mechanical issues
snippet.description:
Rory McIlroy blames struggles on mental, mechanical issues by Emily Kay on Oct 15 2013, 10:24a
Rory McIlroy has a chance, in the several global tournaments he has left to play in 2013, to turn around his lamentable season.
